content:
# The recipe for the iron gear wheel requires 2 iron plates to produce one gear wheel. 
# Since I currently have 5 iron plates, I can craft up to 2 iron gear wheels if needed.

# Crafting iron gear wheels could be a good step towards creating more complex items like assembling machines or transport belts.

# I will proceed to craft 2 iron gear wheels using the iron plates in my inventory.
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=2)  # Craft 2 iron gear wheels.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after crafting. 
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
